title: Caves Deep
author: Rocky Pickaxe
pages: Cave diving can be perilous. Darkness lurks with every corner. Torches are your best friends here.
Dripstone Caves add vertical challenges. Watch your step or risk a painful fall. Their formation is impressive.
Echoing caves are eerie. The sound of your steps amplifies. Keep an ear out for lurking mobs.
Lush Caves are a treasure trove. Axolotls swim happily here. They're a sight for sore eyes.
Warden territory is no joke. Silence is key to survival. The skulk will guide your path.
